content: Had the most amazing coffee this morning at the new cafe downtown. The barista drew a perfect heart in the foam, and it just made my entire day brighter. Sometimes it's the little things that matter most.
Watched the sunset from my apartment balcony today. The sky was painted in the most incredible shades of orange and pink. I felt so grateful for this moment of peace after a hectic week.
My best friend surprised me with tickets to see my favorite band! I literally jumped up and down when they told me. Can't wait for the concert next month!
Finished reading 'The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo' today. What an emotional rollercoaster! The ending had me in tears but also feeling so fulfilled. Great storytelling.
Tried to cook a fancy dinner tonight but it didn't turn out as expected. The pasta was overcooked and the sauce was too salty. Ordered pizza instead and laughed about it.
